summary: In March 2019, the White House directed NASA to accelerate its plans to return humans to the moon by 2024—4 years earlier than NASA had planned. To meet this new goal, NASA made some changes to its approach. But it is still pursuing an array of complex efforts, including a small platform in lunar orbit called the Gateway, where crew could transit to and from...
title: NASA Lunar Programs: Opportunities Exist to Strengthen Analyses and Plans for Moon Landing
